messages.title: A FAIRER BRITAIN
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the rich.

messages.title: TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will cut the urgent carbon needed to protect our environment, energy and green technology.

messages.title: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will invest real terms in schools to ensure the future of every child, and in our NHS to guarantee the support it needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build an economy that works for everyone, not just the rich.
Cut urgent carbon and invest in renewable energy and green technology.
Invest real terms in schools to ensure the future of every child.
Invest in our NHS to guarantee the support it needs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The only way to stop Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Candidate is to vote for the Liberal Democrats.

issues.economy: Build an economy that works for everyone, not just the rich.
issues.education: Invest real terms in schools to ensure the future of every child.
issues.environment: Cut urgent carbon and invest in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS to guarantee the support it needs.

leaflet.personalStatement: You can trust Laura to represent Sheffield Hallam well because she lives here, has campaigned here, and has already started work here as a councillor.

images.caption: Result here at the 2017 General Election

leaflet.additionalNotes: As the leaflet suggests strategic voting considerations ('The only way to stop Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Candidate'), this indicates a tactical voting situation in the constituency.
